name: free-dr-pepper-for-everyone-chinese-democracy
title: Free Dr. Pepper For Everyone! [Chinese Democracy]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Thank Guns N’ Roses for your free Dr. Pepper today. Just fill out a bunch of forms and wait – To eliminate that pesky internet coupon sharing thing, Dr. Pepper will be mailing coupons out in a couple weeks. Whatever, just give us our free drinks and we’ll be happy. The only catch is that you have to sign up before midnight, and the giant ticker at the top of the Free Dr. Pepper site will let you know just how much time you have left.
